description:
Bring together key activities — conversations, documents, and more — into a unified, topic-based solution.


Enhancements:
- NetDocuments SmartView previewer has been integrated with ndThread to allow a seamless previewing experience between ndWeb and ndThread
- Users can now mark an entire Thread as Read from left hand navigation menu
- A Mark All as Read action has been added to the Unread section in the workspaces list
- Improved Search Efficiency and updated searching interface
Bug/UX Fixes:
- Fixed a bug where users were being removed from the DM list
- Fixed a bug where some users were not getting DMs
- Fixed a search bug in which search results appeared in the wrong order
- Portions of the UI/UX, such as icons and groups, have been updated
